short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyze your website SEO and rank faster

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An SEO audit is the foundation of your optimization strategy. It involves a thorough analysis of your website to identify areas that need improvement. With Rankingsfactor chrome extension you can perform an effective SEO audit.

Technical SEO Check: Ensure your website is accessible to search engines. Check for issues like broken links, crawl errors, and XML sitemap errors. Tools like Google Search Console and Screaming Frog can help in this process.
Mobile-Friendliness: With the majority of searches coming from mobile devices, having a mobile-friendly website is essential. Use Google’s Mobile-Friendly Test to check your site’s responsiveness.
Page Speed: Slow-loading pages can deter visitors and negatively impact rankings. Tools like Google PageSpeed Insights and GTmetrix can help you analyze and improve your site’s load times.
SSL Certificate: Ensure your website is secure with an SSL certificate. HTTPS is a ranking factor and builds trust with your audience.
